name: Senior Thesis Seminar
description: Compulsory for all Specialists undertaking a one-year dissertation. Weekly seminars provide training in reviewing literature, writing research proposals, formulating hypotheses, oral presentation of findings and constructive critique of other students’ work. Posters will be prepared for an annual spring conference. History Specialists only. Students must find topics and thesis supervisors. Not eligible for CR/NCR option. See department website for per-requisites and specific registration instructions. (http://history.utoronto.ca/undergraduate/senior-thesis)
